website_summaries.verdict: These compact magnifying glasses enable you to choose your magnification and light levels.
pros: 2.5x and 3x magnification with three LED lights on each that equally distribute the light
Clear lens with minimal distortion near the edges
cons: Some feel that the light is not powerful enough, even on the highest setting

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar Optics LED Magnifying Glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of these magnifiers. I like the smallest one of the set because for my needs it is the strongest. For my needs, the smallest only makes the images clearer but not by much and not much larger either (in my situation). The price paid is reasonable for these and yes, I would and will buy them again because of the smallest one. It is a shame that you can't buy just one of these if you know the magnification you need at the time of purchase. Would I recommend this, yes!
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. StarnerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar Optical magnifying glasses set of 3
customer_reviews.text: Vivitar optics set of 3 magnifying glasses arrived. I gave the smallest one to a friend for a gift. I still have the intermediate and large ones. They are good sized and not too bulky. They are light in weight and use 2 AAA batteries. The led lights up nicely so you can read small print easily. My eyes are not as good as they used to be and have didficulty teading the fine print on labels. Thank you for a fine product at an affordable price. The set of three was only $16.95 . I feel it is an excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: It is a great help whether you have vision loss or not.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because a good friend lost some of her vision due to an illness followed by a stroke in her eye. My family already had one of the largest ones and I just knew that it would help her. I gave her just the large one because she had to have a big one to do her any good. She was absolutely thrilled because it helps her so much. Even if a person doesn't have poor eyesight, because of the lights on it you can see tiny details that you otherwise might miss. I may buy more to give to other friends!
customer_reviews.author: D. Estridge

customer_reviews.title: These are really helpful
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few sets now. My husband and I are in our late 60's and it's getting tough to read fine print. I keep one in our dining room, living room, bedroom and our respective home offices. I keep one in my car (for reading menus in dark restaurants and one where I work. The light is quite bright and the lens does not distort. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Peebles

customer_reviews.title: One of the best magnification/light devices I have ever used. I've used it much more than I initially thought I would!
customer_reviews.text: Nice light! Make working on smal task so much easier. As we progressively age, our eyes require more and more lighting to see thing easily. There are a couple of things to be advised of however. The off-On power switch can be slid off and on very easily, so if you store this magnifier in a drawer with other items, choose a spot where nothing could touch it, thereby turning on the light. If this happens, then the (2) triple A batteries will be depleted the next time you start to use magnifier. This happened to me is why I bring this to your attention. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as described on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These items are much better quality than I expected. They perform exactly as I need them to. I'm very satisfied with this purchase. I will order again as family members loose them. Product is very handy & I'm very satisfied. I've purchased similar items in the past & compared to these similar items I like this product best. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DW Huntsville AL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent optical magnifier at a good price but consider a smart phone app as well
customer_reviews.text: I am almost 70 and have the usual senior need for a magnifier. I have switched to an app called Mag.LightPro on my iphone 6. By tapping into the excellent camera system of the phone you get features such as autofocusing at longer distance from the object, variable magnification over a wide range, and variable lighting. I gave my Vivitar to a relative who has an old flip phone and it is working very well for her as it did for me. This is not to detract from the Vivitar but I just wanted to bring attention to this alternative in case you hadn't thought of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I bought another set of these because they are so nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are bright, light weight and has a size for every application. I liked them so much I bought another set so I can have one available in each room.
customer_reviews.author: CastletonTrader

customer_reviews.title: These are so great that we have bought them 3 times!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for an older family member who is having vision problems. She loved them so much that she bought another set so she could have one in each room. The lights are bright, they are easy to hold and they have held up well over the years. Now I am buying some for myself to read fine print, prescription bottles and stuff like that. We highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: it is super handy and the optics are good
customer_reviews.text: I keep these all through out the house. With the built in light, it is super handy and the optics are good. It is a nice clear view. I have ordered these and given these also at least 3 or 4 times. My favorite magnifier. You just can't beat Vivitar optics.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work well. You can illuminate what you're looking at/see what you're illuminating. :) They don't have a large magnification power, but if you're not looking for that they're fine. I've dropped one of them before and the battery cover went flying off but didn't break. Once I purchased them and the switch on two of them didn't work right. I didn't have to return them but was refunded the entire purchase price. I showed these to my mom and she may buy a set too but wants to compare against other available choices.
customer_reviews.author: quisten8

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out product which works excellently.
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like? Two magnifying glasses that have well made plastic lenses and LEDs. Smooth handle, easy grasp, and easy to change batteries (each magnifier requires two AAA batteries which are not included). Push the small switch upwards and you have brighter LED power, push to the middle and the LEDs are off and push downwards and you have the LEDs on low power. Pretty nice bulletproof magnifying glasses for the hobbyist. Would definitely recommend to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aurelius

customer_reviews.title: Worked out better than I started out wanting
customer_reviews.text: Nice optics, not dime-store plastic with distortions. LED lights are placed to uniformly light the subject. Nice low price. Every feature is done well so just buy it. I wanted one but 3 was inexpensive enough I bought the set. What I didn't consider is "I want one to use", but then realized I'm at work some times and home other times. I'm not going to carry it back & forth so one becomes two. Then my wife wanted one also, becoming the third magnifier. And you get sizes to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: KennyK

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and not very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they look so good in the photos. All those lights must be better than one light right? Wrong. I also bought the UltraOptix Round LED Magnifier 4 Power - SV-3LPLED and it is a much better device than these Vivatars. The UltraOptix are well designed and have a strong magnifier. Time and again I pick up a Vivatar, it fails to enable viewing whatever I'm trying to see, I go fetch the UltraOptix and voila! I can see that tiny print! I don't know why but the UltraOptix works better. That fact plus the Vivatar's annoying battery cover that will not stay on are my reasons for bypassing these cheap magnifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Grandavia

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Good value.  Just wish Amazon would sell one rather than 3 at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Didn't need 3, but couldn't find any decent singles for sale. Had picked up a small (smaller than the small one here) when in China a few years ago and found myself using it several times a week to read tiny printing on small objects like miniature electronics. Figured a second one at home would be handy. Having those small LED lights in my old (and these) magnifiers are extremely useful. Haven't had these long enuf to see how they hold up. Should be no problem. As one other reviewer stated - only (minor) defect is the switch - too easy to accidentally leave the lights on. I don't see need for 2 light level settings. .
customer_reviews.author: j. Callicott

customer_reviews.title: Battery connections faulty
customer_reviews.text: As a magnifying glass, these are fine. But when I installed the batteries in each unit, the LED lights did not turn on when switched on. After checking and finding the batteries were strong, I reinstalled them several times. Finally, I was able to get each of them to work. May be a manufacturing flaw in the electrical.
customer_reviews.author: T Echols

customer_reviews.title: I've had these for a bit over a year now ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a bit over a year now and all the lights are still working. For the price I really expected this to be a problem but it isn't. The lens are clear, no deformity when viewing objects. I'm a machinist with eyesight that just isn't what it used to be, even with glasses the minute details are blurred. These solve the dilemma. I assist others so I'm moving about and have three of these located at various spots and will be ordering another set shortly. I guess that's the ultimate approval of a product, that I'm willing to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The battery lasts forever and to have the lights with the magnifying glass makes a tremendous difference. One of the best items I've ever purchased for a price that can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot - they are easy to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot - they are easy to hold and I love having the light on it. They are really light weight so it's easy for my arthritic hands to hold. The magnification works fine for me. I may still use my readers while looking at something through them but that does not bother me. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because I could never get the battery cover back on once I put them in. My husband had to tape it shut. Still love them and would not let that stop me from buying/using them.
customer_reviews.author: L Walsh

customer_reviews.title: vivitar magnifying glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about eight sets of these over a period of time and have not found anything as useful. I suffer with macular degeneration; I take two of the three and put together and read the kindle with the largest font. Would recommend to anyone. Only one design flaw;the light switch is in the middle position to turn the light off. Have to take care to turn the light off to extend the length of batteries. The led works great and has excellent life. Again, a real winner, especially for people with sight problems. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: yarg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - weak, poorly distributed light.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. The light is not as bright nor as even as I had hoped. They even have a dark area in the very center of the lens viewing area. I will be donating these to the thrift store. FYI, at the same time, I bought a "Carson® 5x MiniBrite LED Lighted Slide-Out Aspheric Magnifier with Protective Sleeve (PO-55)" (  ). I liked it a lot. In fact, I just bought two more of them to keep in different places. (But be careful, they are listed twice on Amazon, one for $7.39 and another for over $12. Perhaps there is difference but I do not see it.)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifying glasses - great lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect magnifiers if you want a large field of view with decent magnification. The LED lights are fantastic--you'd be surprised how much they help. I can't imagine any complaint about these, unless you want really high magnification, in which you need to buy, instead of this, a 10x - 40x loupe (you can get very good, very cheap ones on Amazon), but that will provide you with a much smaller field of view. This product is perfect for mild to moderate magnification, such as reading the tiny recycle signs on plastics, looking for lice in your kids' hair, you know--all the routine activities of daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Light and Magnify work!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these for Christmas presents. People used mine and were amazed because of the lights and the magnifying so they made great stocking stuffers and presents! I have them handy in a drawer. I wear bifocals but they print so small sometimes I really use these! Especially on the back of the TV's and Computers when you need the numbers for the services! They come in handy for reading ingredients on packaged food too! I've had them for a couple of years and remember changing the batteries once.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Age makes letters smaller.
customer_reviews.text: These are really helpful and well made. This is the second time I have purchased these Magnifying Glasses. I have them in the kitchen to see the small print on most food items' (for time to microwave and oven cook.) I have them in my sewing room and also the bathroom( for any close up views of injuries) I purchased one set for my Husbands work shed , to assist in close up work. They work just fine ,and the lights are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Hicks

customer_reviews.title: So good I now have 4 sets
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the fourth set I have purchased. I have a set st work which sometimes get one or two borrowed and forget to come back to my desk. One at computer at home one at my desk at home. The third set st the kitchen table. This set is for the bar so anyone in the house can borrow as needed. Some I keep with batteries and some not needed. I keep one under my pillow with batteries to read pill bottles at.night and to read in bed so i do notnhave to get up to turn the lights off.
customer_reviews.author: caraseed

customer_reviews.title: Great Visual Aid
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great. Work even better than I expected. I especially liked the way they arrived in their packaging. Very safe and secure. The lighting works great and the magnifying is wonderful. Helps me with reading small print and the light is awesome. I am very satisfied and would recommend these to anyone. I have a bible concordance that the print is so small it became impossible for me to read anymore. I now can see great and it is easy to use, not a hassle at all.
customer_reviews.author: mdcd

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar Viv-mag-2 Set Of 2 Magnifying Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Since both my spouse and I have vision that has suffered along with the remainder of "us" as we age, a magnifying glass is a necessity for many reading tasks. We have owned several--large, small, non-lighted, plastic etc.--that did not help. These Vivitar lighted magnifying glasses are absolutely what we needed, plus, I would hardly consider them a toy. They are well constructed; the lights are extremely helpful and there is no no noticeable distortion such as you get from many magnifying glasses. I will order more just to have them available in more places. Highly recommended! And the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: GCollins

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well
customer_reviews.text: The little tiny lights are kind of a joke; maybe in pitch black they would light things up, but they are of very limited use in a reasonably well lit room. Since you get two, the individual price is around 5 bucks each (well, slightly higher), and they do a decent job of magnfying things to a decent size. I'm satisfied with the purchase for the purpose I use them for. There are a lot of magnifying glasses out there, and this one is decent. Enough said. Postscript: Perhaps I was a bit harsh with the lights; they actually have helped me a couple of times in limited light.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: a MUST HAVE for Seniors with vision issues.
customer_reviews.text: I try my best to research for higher quality items. These Vivitar LED Magnifiers are the best rated I could find, and they are awesome. If you buy one set, expect to invest in several more for elderly friends who want one too. The bright circle of leds give an even spread of light. The Largest size is by far the best and desired by most people. I installed lithium batteries for long life (not included). This is the forth set I've bought to "gift" away and I'm sure I'll soon hear another "wish" for the same! I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoFlyBy

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT a Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who has trouble reading small print (60 yrs. young!). He loves it. Although this might be a fine 'toy', it is wonderful for those who have trouble reading small print. Along with this pair of Vivitar lighted magnifying glasses, I went ahead and ordered other more proper magnifiers as well .... those typically purchased for someone who needs those bifocals. My husband likes these Vivitars better. He is still working and needs to read contractor plans and such and the lighted feature really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Palos Place

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not like these because I thought it was a box of three - all the same size and I happened to open the small one first. I thought it was bulky and too bright on both light settings. Then I happened to open up another box to give away and voila! It contained a bigger magnifying glass, which I now LOVE. I know what you are thinking - what a dum dum;). Anyway,these are totally worth it. Seller shipped right away.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Use them every day
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple around my house. I keep one in every pencil cup. The fact that there are three to a box makes it feel like a really great value. I've used mine for over two years and they are going strong!
customer_reviews.author: lvoigt2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. This was the second set I bought. The first set was a two pack, but this three pack is a better deal. Once we got the first set of two we wanted more since two wasn't enough. I needed one at work, in the car, in the kitchen, at my desk, etc. To that end I bought this three pack which is just a couple of dollar more than the two pack. I am about to order yet ANOTHER set of these since my presbyopia ("old man eyes") is making it hard to see the little things in life! Do I recomend these? Yes?
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier with lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnifiers for my 98 year old mother who has glaucoma and macular degeneration. My mother needed the magnification and extra light. They work well for her for reading!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Quality beyond its pricetag
customer_reviews.text: I took the chance that these magnifiers would be "decent", I'm glad I was wrong as these are much better than decent, I rate them as better than average. While not a Nikon medical grade lens, they are not priced in the same galaxy either. For the money and price point I have not encountered a better deal. The dual light options are a very nice touch, it allows users to select two different light levels/brightness's
customer_reviews.author: Frank pepper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about ordering these but the price hooked me. I have had some bad experiences with other items from Vivitar. Still....I thought, I have not invested too much if they don't work. So....I went against my better judgement and am so glad I did. These are great! I have one that my mother picked up at Barnes and Noble. It was ok but the light really didn't work and it was a little fuzzy. These are both great. The price is also super fantastic. I know have one for the car and one for home. I could not be happier. Way to go Vivitar....you got this spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Мартин

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These lighted magnifying glasses are great if your eyes are older than 40 or so. However, I bought these 14 months ago and have had problems with both magnifiers. They worked for a few months, then started flickering - both of them, same thing. I would have thought Vivitar would have made great gear, but I'm going to have to buy new lighted magnifiers, and they won't be Vivitar
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery  from seller, great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: The magnifier is clear and perfect for reading small print. Focus right on as well as magnification. Excellent quality for the price. I have read other reviewers complaints on the battery cover and I understand. The cover doesn't slide in and click with the thumb as is the usual method; you have to fully insert the tab closest to the lens first at an angle them press down the battery cover at the handle end to click in. I don't know why but you can not slide in the battery cover in the usual manner we are use to but it works fine with this method. no worries. it's a great glass.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gendron

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, one LED was out on the largest glass, rather than face returning, I pulled the three screws and found the loose connection and soldered it back together. Good quality power switch, high or low with off in the middle, doesn't get left on or switched on accidently
customer_reviews.author: John Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good magnifier set that would be perfect if weren't for the reflections.
customer_reviews.text: 3 in a set in different sizes and magnification. Nice quality plastic. The lens are clear but you get annoying reflections. The led lights are good. I use them to read small prints on maps and packagings. I am pretty sure you will get dizzy if you use them to read books. I also use the lights to see the inside of my desktop computer when minor repair or maintenance is needed. I am happy that I have them. Convenient.
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Best magnifiers for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best magnifiers I've ever purchased. The three different sizes allow you to use them in many different situations/places. They give a clear view of on object/text both printed and on a monitor. The illumination lights are evenly placed around the edges and give the correct amount of light to the object/text you are viewing. The switch is handy to adjust the brightness of the light or turn it off. The material of the magnifiers feels of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Handy mangifying glass for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem like fair value for the price. I was looking for a magnifying glass to give to a young child as a gift. The toy versions seemed suitable, but after getting one I thought it was worthless. These provide decent magnification with the added feature of led lights...so it could be used as a simple flashlight, as well as a magnifying glass. I wish they both had 8x magnification. The light switches work correctly, but the detent/stops are weak and it is easy to accidentally turn the light on when it is stored.
customer_reviews.author: MCO

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifying glasses
customer_reviews.text: Two magnifying glasses, backlit by LED. The description about says it all. Having integrated LEDs really helps with illuminating the subject. There is a "low" and a "high" light setting on each, so I can cater the light to my needs. the optics are clear and great. The handle is adequately ergonomic and comfortable to hold. By my standards, they're light enough to hold for a while, but with a proper amount of heft to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: T Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Can read anything with this!
customer_reviews.text: I already have magnifying glasses, but none with built in LED lights. My most recent use was clock repair! A tiny fitting came loose, but with this trusty well-lit magnifier, I could see that I didn't need to throw it away but simply put the part back in its fitting. Clock is going strong, and I have this magnifier to thank for it. It also is excellent for any hard-to-see print with two settings of brightness: press the button up for bright, press down for less bright. Stock up and give as gifts; every household needs this pair of handy, very clear magnifying glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Noble

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Magnifying glasses were Christmas present. They work ok, the switch is a little funky 'cause the OFF position in in the middle of a three position switch. Why not have OFF at either end?? You have to position it just correctly in the middle. The biggest disappointment is that the lenses are not polished that well. There are scratch lines on both lenses that are partially polished out but not quite. They are visible on both lenses with the LED's on and off. I gave it three stars but could have been two, they deserve 2 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: BS from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Ah, I See!
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best! Anyone with parents should get them a set right away -- and get one for yourself too! As we age, we need more light to be able to read and I'm pretty sure manufacturers of just about everything are investing in ever-shrinking print sizes and they enjoy printing in shades of gray. I keep one of these at my desk and one in the coffee table in my living room (in a drawer). Seriously a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Babe

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar handheld LED Illuminated Magnifiers Set of 3
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother who has macular degeneration. When I purchased them, I thought that there were 3 because each one had a different magnifying capability. I was wrong about that. They are all three the same strength, but it's good to have three because she keeps one in the kitchen, one in the den, and one in the bedroom. It would be a real pain to have to go trekking for it from one end of the house to the other. And the lights are very beneficial. This was a GREAT HELP to my mom. Kudoos.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine E. Siggins

customer_reviews.title: Easily Left On
customer_reviews.text: The switch moves too easily and though it has good brightness it is easy to leave on if left facing down.
customer_reviews.author: A C Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great set  but the back battery cover pops off kinda easy.
customer_reviews.text: Great set but the back battery cover pops off kinda easy. Great build other than that. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Printed Unlimited

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic for when you have trouble seeing that small print. Everyone who see's me use one asks how to get it. So happy I found this. Will always keep some around to help with vision
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: While I was the magnification on these was a tad higher they're still a real good deal. I keep the bigger one on my desk and it comes in handy several times a week. It's far better than having to ask my wife to read things to me. The smaller one also isn't bad either. The only real problem I had with it was when I turned it on and looked down between the keys of my keyboard. Ugh...that led to an hour of cleaning and some serious concern of whether I was close to creating a new lifeform.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Esq

customer_reviews.title: For people who need magnification for close up work and must carry with them outside the home. Portable, convenient, two sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very good value and the two magnifiers are each a different size, making it easy to use one or the other depending upon the situation. Small one I carry in my purse. The larger one I leave next to the telephone at home to use for notes and numbers etc Recommend these for people who can must use magnifiers for all close up reading and want several to have accessible due to the necessity of needing one for many tasks. Also light wright and easy to hold but we'll made.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice magnifying glass for small items--not for general reading
customer_reviews.text: I need these to read almost everything. The glass is good, the lighted magnifier helped lots. My only objection is they are not large enough for reading newspapers or books. The rectangular shape would be much better. If you just need a good magnifier for reading pill bottles, directions or something small; these are fine. I really needed a lighted rectangular magnifying lens.
customer_reviews.author: NE OH bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Seller only ships one, not set of 3 magnifying glasses, as described
customer_reviews.text: Description shows "Set of 3 LED lighted magnifiers", but only one magnifying glass was delivered. Order was returned to seller for replacement and the replacement was also a single magnifying glass in a box marked "set of 3". The order shows as complete, so the other two items are not en route, so I will be returning this as well. Hopefully the refund will be less frustrating to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set of magnifyers
customer_reviews.text: I almost gave four stars, because these are not exactly "laboratory grade". Then I considered the price of them. You would have a hard time finding better instruments anywhere near the price Amazon charged. I noticed some complaints about battery doors. They need to be installed carefully as they are a very precise fit. You almost need a magnifying glass to see that the door is properly aligned before you slide it to lock........ Kidding about magnifying glass. But I find the doors quite secure, and the switch easy enough to get used to. I hope this helps someone!
customer_reviews.author: H. lotz

customer_reviews.title: Makes my other magifying glass look like fools gold.
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with my eyesight particularly when I am reading at night or doing puzzles. This magnifying glass is exactly what I needed, it has a good magnifying glass on it much better than my last one that I can tell you, and the led lights brighten what ever I am reading, very well. The only problem that I have with them is that you have to switch the switch to the middle to turn them off when I first got them I left them on overnight and drained my batteries. However, regardless of that little mishap I still really love these magnifying glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Brady

customer_reviews.title: Just what my eye's needed
customer_reviews.text: As we get older our eyes need more light and magnification to read the small print. I had a magnifying lens without a light and it was still hard to read some items. With these magnifiers I am able to read things much easier than without a light. They even have a high low switch for the light. Well worth the money I paid for them. I do think the larger ones could use a couple of more led bulbs to make the light a little more even. Over all, I love them, now I have one at my home office, work office and car.
customer_reviews.author: End UserTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The set of three magnifying glasses from Vivitar is a much better deal than the last l.e.d. Magnifier I bought which was only one and was cheaply made. I ordered two but only one worked. These are a higher quality and less expensive. I would give 5 stars except for the fact that the switch is difficult for my dad to operate as "off"" is in the middle. He tends to push the switch all the way down, dim, or all the way up, bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Why are these magnifiers packaged as a set of 3? Beats me. I needed only one, but I like all three. Six LEDs around the rim of the glass provide good, even lighting. Much better than the average lighted magnifier that has only one light. It would be nice to have them in some kind of pouch or other device for protecting them from scratches. Also, the magnifiers should have their magnification power stamped on them. Generally, larger diameter magnifiers are lower power, but not everyone knows that. C'mon, guys, help the consumer here!
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great. The LED lighting is a big plus for these tired old eyes. I can't really tell enough difference in the strength of the magnification to merit having three in the same drawer, so they're spread around the house and really come in handy for reading small print, looking for copyright dates in old books, reading serial numbers off appliances, looking for inscriptions on old jewelry, etc.
customer_reviews.author: FrogLady

customer_reviews.title: Good product:$ ratio with this purchase if it suits you
customer_reviews.text: Three of these for about $12, all lighted, is a good deal. The glass feels pretty solid in there, looks clear, the switches though plastic feel tight as the click into place, not loose. I don't know about the others, but the largest magnifier has 2 light settings, less bright & more bright. The only problem is I'm not sure how many drops the plastic handle could take before breaking, but can't complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gottatrot

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - well made and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice LED magnifiers. We did notice that the brightness of the LED lights increased dramatically when we used high-end batteries like ENELOOP that were well charged. Note these magnifiers do not ship with batteries. Lights seem to have two settings. I wish they came in easier to open packaging - it was a bit of a struggle to get them out. All in all, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: kalysonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for burning ants!
customer_reviews.text: When I try to burn light colored ants I find the smaller magnifying glasses are more effective. I like the fact that these are illuminated so I can find Ants In The Dark. When I try to burn my uncle however he punched me in the nose. So don't use them to burn your uncle's, only ants.
customer_reviews.author: daried

customer_reviews.title: The Lights Make All The Difference!
customer_reviews.text: I love these magnifiers! I don't know how I got along without them! There are 6 LED lights circling the rim of these units which lights the whole viewing area rather than just a part of it like with other lighted magnifiers. The lights are bright but not too bright. Each unit requires two AAA batteries. I've only had to change the batteries once since purchasing these over a year ago, so you know they don't suck the life out of the batteries. I HIGHLY recommend these! Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mizpackfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. I am in my mid 40's and the close up vision is really starting go. These will help in the transition. I bought a set for my mom too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lenses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Vivitar is king! Excellent optics , very useful across the entire field of view, very little distortion. The LED lights are very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Bob P.

customer_reviews.title: These work great. The light is very bright
customer_reviews.text: These work great. The light is very bright. Love the different magnifications. I bought a set for my grandparents who are in their 90's and then went back and bought a second set for my mother because she liked them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel297

customer_reviews.title: CLEAR
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they really help you see things. I carry the small one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: N. M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of LED magnifiers.
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of magnifiers with light. The switch has a sensitivity problem.
customer_reviews.author: CHEMED

customer_reviews.title: Light switch only works intermittently
customer_reviews.text: Decent lens but the light switch works poorly. Have to jiggle it to get the light to turn on or off. The light is nice and bright though. Disappointed that Vivitar would release a product with such a low-quality switch.
customer_reviews.author: 3jobsnosleep

customer_reviews.title: Great product! (glass)
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome if your getting older or have a hard time with fine print or if you just need to get a little closer look at a project your working on. The lights are bright and the optics are good. They are a little light weight but good for the price. They use (2) AAA batteries in the handles. I wish they came with cases but a black booty sock is a fine solution to protect too. I might add: These work great for DLSR digital camera sensor cleaning as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ezutguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Item: Makes life easier to have these around.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. Great to have around when you need to read a label or one of those teeny-tiny printed instructions. Having three of them in the set allows me to have one in different places -- all handy when you need it. The magnification is good and there are two choices for the LED lights: Dim and Bright. (Move the sliding switch down or up.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Jason

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, just needs a better switch
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice clear optics. Bright, even lighting from the LEDs Perfect magnification level for reading circuit boards, which is what I use these for. YMMV. Cons: The On-Off-On switch is infuriating. Up is bright, down is dim and middle is off, but it is difficult to get it in the middle (off) position. It takes multiple tries and it just annoying. And it's not just me, everybody in the office that borrows it says the same thing. It got so bad that I took the handle apart and rewired things to get rid of the dim mode. Now, up is on and down is off. This is the way it should have been all along!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hsiung

customer_reviews.title: nice set
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I got 2 in the package. They work well. The lights are a big help. They seem to be built well. My kids have dropped them onto wood floors repeatedly without breaking them. I bought these to really inspect a metal edge when sharpening my knives. But I realized quickly, I need something with more magnification. I use it but I keep telling myself I need something stronger. Once I get a stronger one, I'm sure these will be fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These Vivitar Optics LED Magnifying Glasses are everything I hoped they would be. Lightweight, provide a lot of light, and the magnification is clear. I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: JSco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!  No batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Annoying to find that the batteries are not included so I really can't give an opinion on how they work. I don't see anywhere that batteries are NOT included so I stupidly assumed they were. And they are not a size that is particularly common so I have to wait to go get some before I can tell if the items work! At least put on the description that the customer needs to provide the batteries for them
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The built in LED lights are a great addition to facilitate viewing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to learn about magnifying glasses. The built in LED lights are a great addition to facilitate viewing. Seem to be of good quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my fatherinlaw as he is getting up there in years, it is a great help to him and he uses it all the time. The feature he likes best is the extra light which helps his old eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Ruybal

customer_reviews.title: I love these Magnifiers!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great I especially love the lights around them. I have one in the office and the living-room and purchased more, I have one in my purse for reading small print at the grocery store and I gave two to family members for that purpose as well. We all love them. I would recommend these and I would buy them again!!
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton Foster

customer_reviews.title: Vivitar Handheld LED Illuminated Magnifiers Set of 3
customer_reviews.text: My wife is sight impaired and needs help reading all print that is not large type and bold. Her reader she used for many years broke and I found this replacement on Amazon. My wife loves it. She uses the lighted feature often. She has one magnifier at her desk, another in the kitchen and the third by her living room chair. A day doesn't go by that she doesn't use at least one of her magnifiers. I was surprised at the build quality of such a reasonably priced set of three.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, good price, great delivery
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, good price, great delivery. Lense could be slightly wider, but is as advertised. There are two magnifying glasses. Big come complete with batteries, and have a thumb switch with two intensity settings. My wife uses her''s all the time, because she's blind in one eye, and cannot see out of the other eye.
customer_reviews.author: gitrdone

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with these devices as an aid to read small ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with these devices as an aid to read small print for us seniors. The LED light is bright and this device is a must for anyone who is challenged with nearsightedness issues!
customer_reviews.author: DDQ

customer_reviews.title: You may not get the set of 3 as pictured. I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: The 3 sent were not a set as advertised. Not a huge deal but I got two in one sealed pack and a third was a separate single one same as the larger one, not 3 different sizes. Perhaps they were out of 3 pack sets. They give a useful light and the switches work fine in mine. You are getting 3 LED flashlights with this purchase. I think some reviewers confuse diopter rating with magnification X factor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gordon

customer_reviews.title: They work better than unlighted mags
customer_reviews.text: The magnifiers work well. The light really isn't that bright at all, even on "High", but it really doesn't need to be. You get two, one slightly bigger than the other. I would say they are both smaller than your traditional sized magnifying glass though. "Traditional for ME being about 4 inches across." Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice magnifier but the usable area of the lens is a bit smaller than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: Nice magnifier. The rim of the lens is flat on the bottom and the lens is recessed. So, it's easy to sit on the desk without worrying about scratching the lens. It has a high & low setting for the light. I don't see the need for the low setting. But it works fine. I would rate this a 5, but the usable area of the lens is a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Prefect

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading the small print!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have one in my purse and also a few at the house. I usually don't have trouble reading magazines/newspapers, etc. But, sometimes the small print on labels/very small items is very hard to read. Not with this magnifier and even better, you can add a battery to light the word you are trying to read. They also seem like very good quality magnifiers - I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Positively stoked

customer_reviews.title: love the leds on these magnifiers
customer_reviews.text: These are just great with leds and a switch to control the amount of light. There are two sizes and we have used them frequently for reading fine print. I'm very happy with the product. There is no distortion in the lenses. Good purchase for that fine print that all manufacturers seem to put on packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Maryd

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these illuminated lenses for a neighbor with macular degeneration. None of them worked out of the box. I was able to tinker with them and get two to work; the third is not worth the major surgery necessary to repair it. The warranty was so weasel worded I didn't bother to return it. Do yourself a favor and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Totten

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant experience with the Seller and the product. Am very happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Heincy

customer_reviews.title: I never new how many times I would have liked to had this device handy
customer_reviews.text: I never new how many times I would have liked to had this device handy. I've used it 5 or 6 times this week! Bright light and bigger text make it impossible to "get the wrong" number or spelling. A useful tool when the child brings in the first bug. "Mom, look at this!!!" The perfect filler to get to a $35 order.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Zuzich

customer_reviews.title: The best magnifying glasses I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: In July, I had an eye operation. Over the next three months, while I gradually regained my sight, I needed help seeing things. I bought quite a few magnifying glasses. These were my favorites. They have a nice bright light that really helped me. For small print or dimly lit rooms, they were great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busa

customer_reviews.title: Another quality product by Vivitar
customer_reviews.text: Vivitar is famous for making lens and camera accessories. This is the best magnifying glass currently available in the market. These magnifying glasses produce very sharp and clean magnification. It comes as a set of two with different diameters, magnifications and diopter lens, which is very convenient- I am keeping one for myself and giving to one to my older sister who has diminished vision resulted from stroke.
customer_reviews.author: M. RAHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Magnifiers, good magnification , not too strong not too weak, size is decent and the light is a great bonus as when there is not much light the extra illumination is helping a lot. I mainly use the two larger one, though the smaller one is also nice. Took me so long to find a good one, that I Got a second set as backup in case one day this will be out. Also got a set for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Illan

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a set of three magnifying glasses, received only the smallest one.
customer_reviews.author: stephen w herring

customer_reviews.title: The two types that I actually ordered are fine: two of each style
customer_reviews.text: The two types that I actually ordered are fine: two of each style, The particular item shown here was not one that I wanted but got ahyway. Since there wasn't even a packing slip enclosed I have no idea what I should do to get this unwanted merchanadise back to you. No instructions of any kind. As you might suspect I am not a happy camper!!!!! I guess I wasted my time with this kind of order without any means of following up............
customer_reviews.author: Dovie Lance

customer_reviews.title: Good magnifying glasses
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. They are good for looking at the small print on bottles, etc. They are not that great for reading a book or a newspaper, as the lens is not large enough. However, for reading small text, every now and then, it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: RPLTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use one at work and one at home they work great!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality in the glass, so no distortion in the image. Having the LEDs surround the glass provides almost shadowless viewing. Since package included 3 glasses, I have one in my shop, one in the office, and one in my equipment repair area. Have already used many times. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: tada

customer_reviews.title: Simple Gadget that Does What it Claims
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty straightforward, but they've been such a help to my mother. Purchased as a stocking stuffer as she doesn't often wear her glasses indoors and sometimes struggles with itty-bitty print. Apparently these are incredible, as simple as they are. Very bright - so much so that she uses them as magnifiers, impromptu reading lights and even flashlights! Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, handy, LED's are great...
customer_reviews.text: I use these to read tiny stamps and markings on antique firearms. They do a decent job in that they're lightweight and the LEDs are very nice (two settings for brightness). I use them a lot, but sometimes I wish they magnified a little more for the tiniest markings. But I put one on top of the other and achieve higher magnification which is sufficient. Overall a good deal at a great price. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: divercritter

product_meta.title: Vivitar Optics LED Magnifying Glasses 2-Pack, Viv-Mag-2

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars984 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
